data.title: Pink Greens – Blossoms of Hope
data.text:
Pink Greens Golf Tournament

May 9, 2024

Turf Valley Resort

Ahoy Mateys!

Thank you to our Sponsors, Donors, Players and Volunteers for making this Pirate themed Pink Greens Golf Classic a success!

Helicopter Ball Drop

Congratulations to our winners of the the Helicopter Golf Ball Drop, Leigh and Rick!

What a fun morning it was, video will be posted soon along with the pictures by Jenise Dunn Photography.

Schedule

May 9, 2023 @ Turf Valley Resort

9:30 a.m. - Registration opens

10:30 a.m. - Helicopter Drop

11:00 a.m. - Shotgun start

Pink Greens Sponsors

Sponsorships

Sponsorships are available to help make this a successful FUNdraising event. Blossoms of Hope provides a broad exposure for our sponsors as well as always a good time.

Your sponsorship is valuable to the success of Blossoms of Hope’s mission. There are several different levels available with guaranteed exposure for all. We hope you find one that is perfect for you or your company.

$2,500 - *"Thar She Blows" Helicopter Drop Sponsor (2 sponsorships available)*

*New this year!*

Inclusion of name / logo in all advertising

Large sign at event

$2,000 - "Shiver Me Timbers" Dinner Sponsor (2 sponsorships available)

Inclusion of name / logo in all advertising

Large sign at event

$1,500 - "Polly Wants A Cracker" Lunch Sponsor (2 sponsorships available)

Logo on boxed lunches

$1,000 - "Three Sheets to the Wind" Beverage Cart Sponsor (0 sponsorships remaining)

Beverage cart sponsor

$1,000 - "Walk The Plank" Adventure Awaits Sponsor (1 sponsorship available)

Our infamous “Heaven or Hell” prize hole

Signage on the hole that is always full of surprises and guaranteed fun

$750 - "Swash Buckler" Logo Golfer Gifts Sponsor

Golf Ball, Tee and Marker Sponsor

Your choice of ballmarker set, towel, golf tees, or divot repair tool with your logo!

$300 - "Booty" Tee Sign Prize Holes Sponsor

Tee Sign Prize Holes Sponsor

Signage on hole

$200 - "Yo Ho Ho" Tee Sign Sponsor

Tee Sign Sponsor

Signage on hole

Testimonials

In comparison to other charitable golf events, Blossoms of Hope is like a velvet Elvis painting in a room full of Rembrandts. It’s about the most fun you can legally have on a golf course, while proving you don’t have to take yourself too seriously to support a seriously good cause. So leave your pretentions at the door – or the driving range – and enjoy a fun day of golf while helping to support families in need throughout Howard County.

Kevin

My team has been fortunate to take part in this annual event since its inception, in large part because of the team’s efforts helping raise funds for local organizations in need. But, what separates this event from so many others is an environment that fosters a full day of great golf with non stop laughs and enjoyment. From the moment you check in until you leave, you’re sure to experience things and sites you’ll never forget…but sometimes wish you could. Thanks Susie, your team and Blossoms of Hope…Howard County is lucky to have you!

Mike

My group has been playing in the golf tournament since the very beginning. We would never think about missing it because it's the most fun tournament ever! Keep up the great charity work, and we will see you on the course.

Gary

Wouldn't miss this tournament for the world! It's always the first one on the calendar for me and my team. We look forward to not only a great day of golf, food, and beverages but also an amazing cause put together by an incredible team!

Andrew

What Is Pink Greens?

Blossoms of Hope’s Pink Greens is a fun-filled, 18-hole golf tournament. Lunch, dinner and an auction will follow. Prize holes like “longest shot" and “double your money” only add to the fun.

This is a good opportunity to get in a fun day of golfing with friends and colleagues while helping to raise funds for a good cause in the community.
